ref:_00D7000000091pB._500Qk00000KcJNw:ref
Subject: RE: Netwrix Support Ticket #432127 - ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000KcJNw:ref - Support Ticket Closed - Password Reset Failure - ref:_00D7000000091pB._500Qk00000KcJNw:ref

TextBody:
Hi Javaign,

As requested we have updated the password for your username to: epp2011

Please let us know if it works now.

I believe the main issue here is that you have overwritten the root user with your account. I would recommend creating instead a separate account for yourself and renaming the current one to root(it can be disabled so no one can access/use it). The root account has certain exceptions for login that may cause issues if overwritten with user other admin accounts.

If you would like we can schedule a remote session next week and we can do these steps together.

Best Regards,
Flaviu Moldovan | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com
